ygData.subject: Re: Chant of Battle and Jonthan's Whistling Warsong
ygData.msgSnippet: Can someone please explain how to play two songs at once?  Whenever I switch songs the other one ends. Paralto of Povar
ygData.messageBody:
Can someone please explain how to play two songs at once? Whenever I switch
songs the other one ends.

Paralto of Povar

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Robertson [mailto:johnr@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 9:00 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Chant of Battle and Jonthan's Whistling Warsong
>
>
> From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
>
> The Anthem is much better, since it increases your attack speed. The
> effect is subtle, but it is definately there, believe me. It also
> stacks with Jonthan's Warsong, so your attack speed is VERY much sped
> up, and your strength increases by a huge amount. I play these two
> songs when soloing even now at level 17. (And even higher with my high
> level bard in Beta).
>
> Jyzan
